com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop

Interface JoinPoint

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProceedingJoinPoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJoinPoint, BasicJoinPoint, BasicProceedingJoinPoint

    public interface JoinPoint

    Provides contextual information about a join point. A JoinPoint is passed to an Aspect advice when invoked to provide it with reflective state data.

    Version:
    1.0 07/12/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  JoinPoint.AdviceLocation
      Describes the location of advice relative to the join point.
      static class  JoinPoint.JoinPointComparator
      Comparator implementation used to compare JoinPoints based on their precedence.
      static class  JoinPoint.PointcutType
      Describes the type of pointcuts and how it's applied.

      • isClassScope

        boolean isClassScope()
        Indicates if the JoinPoint applies to the entire target Class or just a specific Method.
        Returns:
        true if it is Class scope, false if not

      • getOrder

        int getOrder()
        Returns the advice precedence. A smaller number indicates a higher precedence, while a larger number indicates a lower precedence. The default value is Integer.MAX_VALUE The precedence determines the order in which advice is executed.
        Returns:
        advice precedence

      • setOrder

        void setOrder(int order)
        Sets the advice precedence. A smaller number indicates a higher precedence, while a larger number indicates a lower precedence. The default value is Integer.MAX_VALUE The precedence determines the order in which advice is executed.
        Parameters:
        order -

      • invoke

        java.lang.Object invoke()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the advice.
        Returns:
        the advice return value, if any
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the advice throws any exceptions
